name: Edit a Location  with  Irish Phone Number as a NEUVEN user
Create a Worker with  Irish Phone Number as a NEUVEN user
Edit a Worker with  Irish Phone Number as a NEUVEN user
Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new booking for a direct bank worker – renaming labels -AGENCY WORKERS ONLY
testScript:
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > New Booking
Then
  • If Client Set-Up page for the relevant Client Location has “Agency Workers only” selected
  • Leave headers and labels as they are now

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new booking for a direct bank worker – renaming labels - Direct Bank Workers only  - CREATE
testScript:
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > New Booking
Then
  • If Client Set-Up page for the relevant Client Location has “Direct Bank Workers only” 
  • When Creating a Booking
    • Rename the following labels
      • “Agencies” tab “Booking Distribution”
      • “Agency Name” column header “Worker Source”
      • “Tier” column header "Agency Tier”
      • Rename the label “Please select a Job Type, Start Date and a Rate Type to see agency rates” to “Please select a Job Type, Start Date, and Rate Type to see Agency or Direct Bank Worker rates”

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new booking for a direct bank worker – renaming labels - Direct Bank Workers only - EDIT
testScript:
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > New Booking
Then
  • If Client Set-Up page for the relevant Client Location has “Direct Bank Workers only” 
  • When EDITING an existing  Booking
    • Rename the following labels
      • “Agencies” tab “Booking Distribution”
      • “Agency Name” column header “Worker Source”
      • “Tier” column header "Agency Tier”
      • Rename the label “Please select a Job Type, Start Date and a Rate Type to see agency rates” to “Please select a Job Type, Start Date, and Rate Type to see Agency or Direct Bank Worker rates”

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user When Approving / Rejecting Workers for a booking
testScript:
Verify as a NEUVEN user when When Approving for a booking 
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > Approve bookings List (Pending)
Then
  Rename the following Lables
  • On the Workers Details tab, rename the “Agency Branch” column header “Worker Source”
  • The “Agency Name” column header has been renamed “Worker Source”
